user_instruction: 'Compose an email to get ConstructCo Solutions started on the new project. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Kick-Off Coordination for the [Project Name] – Information & Next Steps  

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m [Your Name], the point of contact at ConstructCo Solutions. We’re excited to join your team on the [Project Name] and want to make sure our start-up is as smooth and productive as possible.

Could you please share or point us to the following?

1. Current project scope, drawings, and specifications  
2. Updated schedule, key milestones, and any critical deadlines  
3. Site logistics plan, safety requirements, and subcontractor protocols  
4. Contact list for the core project team and preferred communication channels  
5. Any existing notes, task boards, or reference materials in Notion (or another platform) that we should review

If these documents are already stored in Gmail threads, Calendar invites, or your Notion workspace, just let me know where to look or grant us the appropriate access, and we’ll retrieve them directly.

Additionally, could we arrange a brief (30-minute) kickoff call early next week to review expectations and pending action items? I’ve included my availability below, but I’m happy to adjust to fit your schedule:

• Monday – Wednesday: 10:00 am–12:00 pm or 2:00 pm–4:00 pm  
• Thursday: 9:00 am–11:00 am

Thank you in advance for your guidance. Please let me know if there’s any preparation we can do ahead of the call.

Looking forward to collaborating!

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Project Coordinator | ConstructCo Solutions  
[Email] • [Phone]

final_output:
